about_the_game:
Attention all adventurers! Have you ever wanted to explore the depths of a mythical world filled with hidden treasures and ancient secrets? Then look no further than "Edegard: Puqq" - the latest offering from Wolfpit Games!

Edegard: Puqq is an attention mining game where you need to craft and eat materials to stay alive. The decisions what you will take with you may become harder as more items are gathered in your cart. The space is limited, but the loot is endless.

In this exciting new game, you play as a brave miner on a quest to find the Elder of your community. You'll need to dig your way through the mountain, which is the body of Roôce, using a variety of materials such as Alukummi and Bloodsteel to craft different tools. From small pickaxes to advanced drills and lasers, there's no limit to what you can create!

But beware, the deeper you go, the more dangerous it becomes. With treacherous caverns, underground lakes, and terrifying creatures lurking around every corner, you'll need to stay on your toes if you want to survive. Will you be able to uncover the secrets of Edegard and find the Elder before it's too late?

Join the adventure soon in "Edegard: Puqq"!

content_descriptors.notes: Drinking Pirruk (fantasy ale), Killing some enemies (resemble animals, can create blood particles), there is a possibility to end the game by killing yourself.
